ComicInfo.Series: Lady Mechanika: The Tablet of Destinies
ComicInfo.Summary:
After a young friend shows up unexpectedly on her doorstep, Lady Mechanika finds herself on a globe-spanning trek in search of the Tablet of Destinies, an ancient Mesopotamian artifact reputed to hold the knowledge of the gods and the secrets of the universe. Join us for the beginning of an all-new adventure with our favorite steampunk heroine!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Edition | Joe Benitez, Martin Montiel & Mike Garcia | 1 | B | Direct Edition | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 6 | C | Retailer Incentive | Joe Benitez & Martin Montiel | 4 | D | Black Edition (Limited to 500 copies and available exclusively from JoeBenitez.com) | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 3 | E | BlueRainbow Exclusive (Limited to 500 copies) | Dawn McTeigue & Kate Flash | 2 | W | White Edition | Joe Benitez | 5 | Note: Covers are lettered (A-Z) according to JoeBenitez.com.
